pages.text: The Final Broom is the truest of them all.$(br)By combining the four base $(l:bewitchment:tools/brooms)Brooms$() with a Nether Star and the four cardinal elements, one can acquire the fastest broom.$(br)
Other than being fast, this broom will also apply Resistance to whoever rides it.$(br)$(l:bewitchment:sigils/using_sigils)Sigils$() may also also be applied to it.
